players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's be vigilant and observe each other closely to ensure the safety of our town."
Diana: "I think we should all share any unusual dreams or experiences we had last night. It might provide some clues as to what happened to Alice."
